resources.string: I am truly grateful for my friends, family, and this life God has given me.
I am always hopeful of the future.
I am incredibly social and everyone has a good time around me.
I am a stupendous conversationalist that can connect with anyone.
I have no problem approaching strangers to talk to them.
I am someone others admire for my achievements.
I always make the most out of my time and think of ways to use it better.
I have chosen an amazing career.
I have the desire, faith, and persistence necessary to achieve any goal I want.
I have an unstoppable confidence that radiates at every moment.
I am a natural leader that cares about those around me.
I am living life for myself and not to please others.
I am able to overcome any hardship with a smile on my face.
